mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{check_in},'YY/MM/DD') + LEVEL - 1, 'YY/MM/DD') AS "RESV_DATE" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{check_out},'YY/MM/DD') - TO_DATE(#{check_in},'YY/MM/DD')

insert.foreach: INTO Soldout ( RESV_ID, biz_id, r_id , resv_date, sout_avail ) VALUES(Resv_ID_SEQ.currval,'${item.biz_id}', ${item.r_id}, '${item.resv_date}', '${item.sout_avail}' )
